actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to a meeting of the Interallied Confederation of Rescue Officers.

summary.text: Welcomes the Interallied Confederation of Reserve Officers to the United States for its 35th Congress. Commends the joint effort of the Reserve Officers Association of the United States and the Department of Defense in hosting such Congress. Urges all Government agencies to cooperate with and assist the Confederation in carrying out its activities.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to a meeting of the Interallied Confederation of Rescue Officers.
